title: NewsBreak: Euro Hits New 2019 Low vs Dollar
text:
NewsBreak: Euro Hits New 2019 Low vs Dollar

Forex 4 hours ago (Sep 26, 2019 06:50AM ET)

© Reuters. Investing.com -- The euro hit a new low for 2019 against the dollar, falling to $1.0923 as of 6:45 AM ET (1045 GMT). There was no immediate trigger for the new low, but it came against a backdrop of fresh uncertainty over European Central Bank policy after the resignation late Wednesday of Sabine Lautenschlaeger in an apparent act of protest against President Mario Draghi's insistence on reviving quantitative easing. hit a six-year low earlier this week Risks of disorderly Brexit also rising as U.K. PM Johnson signals defiance toward opponents also down fractionally at 0.8856.

NewsBreak: Euro Hits New 2019 Low vs Dollar
description: NewsBreak: Euro Hits New 2019 Low vs Dollar
